features: Mr. Pen highlighters come in 6 assorted Morandi colors that are soft, mild, and highly visible to ensure your work stands out. Each of their ink is quick-drying and smudge-proof, making them perfect for highlighting scriptures, notes, journals, or any books you need.
The versatile chisel tip is designed for efficiently producing wide and narrow lines with minimal effort. Plus, the ergonomic pen body ensures comfortable handling without causing sore hands.

Perfect for everyday use at school, college, office, or home – Mr. Pen highlighters fit easily into handbags or pencil cases for convenience on the go! They make an ideal choice for note-taking and studying sessions as well as travel diaries or work schedules.

Not only do they ensure a smooth writing experience with vibrant colors – but they’ll also look good while doing so! With their cute design and bright shades, these highlighters can be used to add extra vibrancy to any page you write on.
An excellent gift idea too! Whether it be birthdays or holidays – these Morandi highlighters will surely bring joy to any recipient who loves scrolling through pages of colorful words.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVED these highlighters!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these highlighters March 30, 2023. I was really starting to get into reading my bible and I wanted highlighters that wouldn't bleed through the pages. I am subscribed to a lovely woman named Melody Alisa, who creates faith-based content on YouTube. She had partnered with Mr. Pen and was raving about their products. So, after doing a little research of my own, I decided to purchase these highlighters. I wasn't sure what to expect but let me just say, these highlighters are so cute, and I love the colors. It was a nice change from the harsh color of the ones I was previously using. I used these highlighters so much that they started drying up. A few of them still work. They probably would have lasted longer, but there were SO many things to highlight in my bible. I loved my Mr. Pen highlighters so much that I ended up ordering their Aesthetic 16pcs, Pastel Morandi color highlighters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty highlighters the colors are so prettyThis work great for my bible study I love how light the colors are and this highlighters don’t fleed like others do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the colors and most of allllll they do t bleed through the pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good markers when they work
reviews.reviewText: I love these highlighters, their colors are amazing, they hardly bleed, they're cute, easy to hold, and go on smooth. The only caveat to this is that my light pink worked for a couple strokes, and then went completely dry. Zero ink comes out now, however, the other markers have been going strong. Other than that, these markers are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty colored highlighters!
reviews.reviewText: i love pastel highlighters since they aren't such an eyesore, and these are really great for their price! the package came with a mustache sticker and (what i assume to be) a handwritten note from the owner. they're great little highlighters! the only issue is i think one of them might be running out after using it on a 300+ page book for annotation, but otherwise i like them a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The colors are just as described and the highlighting quality is amazing. I excepted them to draw like normal markers and cover the words I’m highlighting but that’s not it at all. They draw like normal highlighters. Love! Would buy again, highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I don’t think there truly exists a highlighter out there that will be able to delicately highlight the pages of the Bible without leaking through. With that said, I think these are the closes things that can achieve that. Though they do leak through where you lift off the page, I fix that problem by just following through quickly with a dab of tissue paper, or I would run the highlighter a few times on plain paper to let the inky tip dry out a bit before I start highlighting in the Bible pages. Also, certain colors work better than others. The blue, green, peach and beige work better than the more saturated purple and pink. They’re super cute, has a decent ergonomic grip and seems to last a good while before drying out. One gripe I have is I wish the cap could fit on the ends so I don’t lose the cap as I’m using the pen. Other than that, I think it’s worth a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The colors were soft and still vivid I definitely want to order more of the main yellow pink blue and green highlighters plug more variety I definitely want to order more of the main yellow pink blue and green highlighters 4 more variety
